Action.author: jeffgarratt
Action.body: The failure appears to be due to the peer taking too long to instantiate the chaincode. The most recent behave tests seem to be passing.

Action.author: clayton sims
Action.body: is this resolved? anything left to do?

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: today, I don't see build failures with timeout errors and they are working as configured.. ~ryjones is checking with CI infra provider and will get some information tomorrow.

Action.author: muralisr
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu I did see a failure https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/job/fabric-verify-behave-x86_64/7409/ ... trying a rebase now.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: yes Murali. Observed many builds are failing with timeout error since yesterday evening.. Will wait for ~ryjones inputs on this issue.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: @ry is checking with service provider to improvise the build timeout on x86_64 build nodes.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: @ry updated comments in https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-4561 regarding x86_64 build nodes slowness root cause. I don't see build failures with slowness of the x86_64 in recent days.. Closing this issue now.. Will create a new JIRA item if issue occurs again.
